product_name: Look KeO 2 Max Carbon Bike Pedals
long_description: Look KeO 2 Max Carbon road bike pedals provide maximum power and reliability in a beautiful, lightweight design. Wide, large stainless-steel contact surface ensures efficient, comfortable pedaling. Dual seals, 2 roller bearings, 1 needle bearing, injected carbon body and oversize axles create a durable pedal. Spring adjustment lets you customize release tension from 12 to 18 Nm. Grip cleats help ease walking on slippery surfaces while off the bike.
short_description: Look KeO 2 Max Carbon road bike pedals provide maximum power and reliability in a beautiful, lightweight design.
